Articles.Content: Just to say hi. I bought the game a week ago and am having loads of fun. Struggled with where all the controls were and what they did but it turns out youtube is a friend. Many thanks to Scott Manley.
Scott Manley is arguably the best KSP player ever. Welcome to the Forums!
Thanks Taki. It turns out I have a question which I couldn't find with a quick search of the forum. When I start out in career mode, the capsule is greyed out. Have I missed something?

Did you install MechJeb, that will cause that issue.

And welcome to the forums
I think I know what I've done. I accidentally over-wrote the files with a demo. I'll go and find my original. Sorry to have bothered you.
